plugins.name: Orshot
plugins.description:
Orshot lets you generate dynamic images from templates using API and Integrations like Zapier, Airtable etc.


With Orshot's Figma Plugin, you can import your existing Figma designs in Orshot Studio as a template. And then you can auto-generate dynamic images from that template using Rest API, SDKs and Integrations


How to use the plugin(watch demo):

  1. Select a frame or a group in Figma which you want to import in Orshot Studio
  2. While selected, run the Orshot plugin from Plugins > Orshot
  3. You'll see a window showing the JSON for the selected design
  4. Copy the JSON and paste it in Orshot Studio > Import
  5. The selected design will be replicated in Orshot Studio
  6. After saving, you can automate the template in "API & Integrations" page for the template


Learn more on Figma design automation using Rest API


Notes:

  1. Only supported layers and styles are imported
  2. Current set of supported layers: Text, Rectangle, Circle, Arrows, Images
  3. Images are imported as placeholders which you can replace in Orshot Studio


If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to send an email at hi@orshot.com
plugins.tagline: Auto-Generate Images from your Figma Designs via API and Integrations

140448.name: Orshot
140448.description:
Orshot lets you generate dynamic images from templates using API and Integrations like Zapier, Airtable etc.


With Orshot's Figma Plugin, you can import your existing Figma designs in Orshot Studio as a template. And then you can auto-generate dynamic images from that template using Rest API, SDKs and Integrations


How to use the plugin(watch demo):

  1. Select a frame or a group in Figma which you want to import in Orshot Studio
  2. While selected, run the Orshot plugin from Plugins > Orshot
  3. You'll see a window showing the JSON for the selected design
  4. Copy the JSON and paste it in Orshot Studio > Import
  5. The selected design will be replicated in Orshot Studio
  6. After saving, you can automate the template in "API & Integrations" page for the template


Learn more on Figma design automation using Rest API


Notes:

  1. Only supported layers and styles are imported
  2. Current set of supported layers: Text, Rectangle, Circle, Arrows, Images
  3. Images are imported as placeholders which you can replace in Orshot Studio


If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to send an email at hi@orshot.com
140448.release_notes: - added support for font weight for text elements
140448.tagline: Auto-Generate Images from your Figma Designs via API and Integrations

plugins.name: Quick Edit
plugins.description:
Quick Edit: Your Floating Toolkit for Figma Productivity


Quick Edit is a lightweight Figma plugin designed to supercharge your design workflow. It adds a convenient floating toolbar to your canvas, providing instant access to essential actions like Copy, Paste, Cut, Delete, and Clone. Streamline repetitive tasks with one-click precision, enhancing your focus without interruption.


Enjoy smart positioning that places pasted and cloned items intelligently relative to your selection or at the viewport's center. With a persistent copied state across operations and a minimal, responsive UI, Quick Edit ensures your most common design actions are always just a click away.
plugins.tagline: Finally, Easy Copy/Paste on Figma Touchscreens. Design without limits.

140069.name: Quick Edit
140069.description:
Quick Edit: Your Floating Toolkit for Figma Productivity


Quick Edit is a lightweight Figma plugin designed to supercharge your design workflow. It adds a convenient floating toolbar to your canvas, providing instant access to essential actions like Copy, Paste, Cut, Delete, and Clone. Streamline repetitive tasks with one-click precision, enhancing your focus without interruption.


Enjoy smart positioning that places pasted and cloned items intelligently relative to your selection or at the viewport's center. With a persistent copied state across operations and a minimal, responsive UI, Quick Edit ensures your most common design actions are always just a click away.
140069.tagline: Finally, Easy Copy/Paste on Figma Touchscreens. Design without limits.

plugins.name: Variantor
plugins.description:
Variantor is a powerful tool that allows you to quickly and easily generate multiple icon sizes from a single source. It automates the process of scaling and adjusting the outline for each size, saving time and simplifying work on UI kits and design systems.


What can Variantor do?

  1. Custom sizes and outline thickness

You can set your own size and outline thickness for each icon version, and Variantor will generate all the options in seconds, freeing you from tedious manual work.

  1. Quick color change

Variantor provides the ability to change fill and stroke colors for all icons at once, which is useful when creating branded color palettes.

  1. Flexible component settings

Adjust the margins and spacing of your component to improve its visual appearance. This will make it look more balanced and attractive.

  1. Simple and intuitive interface

Add, edit, or delete properties in just a couple of clicks. This plugin is useful for both novice designers and professionals working with extensive icon libraries.


Variantor is open source and available on GitHub.
plugins.tagline: Plugin for creating multiple icon sizes from a single icon

plugins.name: R.N.A Proto
plugins.description:
R.N.A Proto is a Figma plugin that instantly transforms your designs into fully interactive, pixel-perfect Instagram carousel prototypes.


Create shareable links in a single click that look and feel exactly like the real Instagram app. It's the perfect tool for getting realistic feedback from user testing, and for impressing clients and stakeholders with high-fidelity presentations that work flawlessly on any device.


How It Works


Select Your Frames: Choose the frames you want in your carousel directly on the Figma canvas.


Add a Caption (Optional): Name a text layer "caption" and its content will be automatically used.


Click Publish: The plugin handles the rest, giving you a shareable link in seconds.


Key Features


Pixel-Perfect Realism: Your prototypes are indistinguishable from the live Instagram UI, from the header and icons down to the pagination dots.


Interactive Video Support: Don't just show images. Add .mp4 files to your frames to create prototypes with auto-playing video, just like a real post.


Dynamic and Live: The plugin uses a responsive, three-state UI. It provides helpful prompts when you start, live-updates as you select frames, and gives you a clear success screen when you're done.


One-Click Workflow: No complicated setup or configuration. Select your frames and publish. Itâ€™s that simple.



Perfect For


User Testing: Get authentic feedback by letting users interact with a prototype that feels real.


Client & Stakeholder Reviews: Share a link that anyone can open on their phone or desktop, without needing access to Figma.


Portfolio Pieces: Showcase your work in a dynamic, high-fidelity format.
plugins.tagline: Shareable, Interactive Instagram Protoypes

139984.name: R.N.A Proto
139984.description:

How It Works


Select Your Frames: Choose the frames you want in your carousel directly on the Figma canvas.


Add a Caption (Optional): Name a text layer "caption" and its content will be automatically used.


Click Publish: The plugin handles the rest, giving you a shareable link in seconds.


Key Features


Pixel-Perfect Realism: Your prototypes are indistinguishable from the live Instagram UI, from the header and icons down to the pagination dots.


Interactive Video Support: Don't just show images. Add .mp4 files to your frames to create prototypes with auto-playing video, just like a real post.


Dynamic and Live: The plugin uses a responsive, three-state UI. It provides helpful prompts when you start, live-updates as you select frames, and gives you a clear success screen when you're done.


One-Click Workflow: No complicated setup or configuration. Select your frames and publish. Itâ€™s that simple.

plugins.name: Echarts Builder For Figma
plugins.description:
Charts Builder - Powered by E-Charts API âœ¨ Features


ðŸ“ˆ Chart Types

  1. Line Charts - Simple and smooth line visualizations
  2. Bar Charts - Vertical bar charts with multiple series support
  3. Horizontal Bar Charts - Horizontal orientation for better label readability
  4. Pie Charts - Circular data representation
  5. Doughnut Charts - Pie charts with center hole
  6. Area Charts - Filled line charts
  7. Scatter Charts - Point-based data visualization
  8. Mixed Charts - Combine different chart types in one visualization


ðŸŽ¨ Visual Controls

  1. Title Management - Show/hide, alignment (left/center/right), positioning (top/bottom)
  2. Legend Controls - Position (top/bottom/left/right), alignment options
  3. Axis Controls - Show/hide X/Y axes, grid lines
  4. Dark Mode - Built-in ECharts dark theme support
  5. Custom Dimensions - Manual width/height input (300-1200px Ã— 200-900px)


ðŸ“Š Data Management

  1. Multi-Series Support - Add unlimited data series
  2. Individual Series Controls - Custom colors, types, visibility per series
  3. Data Randomization - Generate random test data (global or per-series)
  4. Real-time Editing - JSON data input with live preview


ðŸ”§ Interface Features

  1. Minimize/Maximize - Collapse to header-only view
  2. Export to Figma - Direct SVG insertion into Figma canvas
  3. Responsive Design - Adapts to plugin window size
  4. Black & White UI - Clean, professional interface (except color pickers)
plugins.tagline: Visual editor to create Apache ECharts and export them as SVGs directly to Figma canvas.

plugins.name: Assumely
plugins.description:
Track assumptions across all your Figma projects and make better decisions, faster.

Assumely helps you validate ideas and avoid costly mistakesâ€”no matter what you're building.


Capture every assumption directly in your Figma files, keeping everything organized in one place. Assumptions added in Figma automatically sync with the free Assumely web app, where you can set confidence levels, importance, and research due dates. You can also assign tasks, comment on progress, and collaborate with your team.
plugins.tagline: Track assumptions across all your Figma projects and make better decisions, faster.

138712.name: Assumely
138712.description:

Assumptions added in Figma automatically sync with the free Assumely web app, where you can set confidence levels, importance, and research due dates. You can also assign tasks, comment on progress, and collaborate with your team.

plugins.name: Export-Dims
plugins.description:
With either a single mock or multiple mocks, this plugin lets you grab dimensions, scaled or raw, for mock elements. If the mock elements don't exist, custom regions can be created and defined.


Much of the calculations are based on what's needed to incorporate mocks into a Qualtrics workflow, particularly one that uses sticky headers. For more on that implementation and how to use the data from this plugin in your pipeline please reach out to terrencepope@.
plugins.tagline: Quickly grab dimensions for Figma frames and nodes.

138387.name: Export-Dims
138387.description:
With either a single mock or multiple mocks, this plugin lets you grab dimensions, scaled or raw, for mock elements. If the mock elements don't exist, custom regions can be created and defined.


Much of the calculations are based on what's needed to incorporate mocks into a Qualtrics workflow, particularly one that uses sticky headers. For more on that implementation and how to use the data from this plugin in your pipeline please reach out to terrencepope@.
138387.release_notes: Cleaned up the code to be more readable
138387.tagline: Quickly grab dimensions for Figma frames and nodes.

plugins.name: Size Snap
plugins.description: Size Snap instantly aligns your designs to a consistent grid by rounding the width, height, stroke width, corner radius, spacing and padding of any selected layersâ€”and their childrenâ€”to a chosen multiple. Whether you pick one of the built-in presets (8, 16, 24, etc.) or enter your own custom value, Size Snap ensures every element snaps to clean, pixel-perfect dimensions.
plugins.tagline: Resize any component and its children to fit a given grid

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

136509.name: Dialekt
136509.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
136509.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: Frame Select Helper
plugins.description:
Supports repeatedly selecting the same group of frames by adding a mark (frame name suffix) to the selected frames.


If you copy and paste the selected frames from this tool onto another page, you can export only the targeted frames to a single PDF file by clicking â€œFileâ€ -> â€œExport frames to PDFâ€!

137113.name: Frame Select Helper
137113.description:
Supports repeatedly selecting the same group of frames by adding a mark (frame name suffix) to the selected frames.


If you copy and paste the selected frames from this tool onto another page, you can export only the targeted frames to a single PDF file by clicking â€œFileâ€ -> â€œExport frames to PDFâ€!

plugins.name: Update Human Design Panel
plugins.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps in Figma.

It retrieves JSON data from an external endpoint and populates predefined fields in a frame named INPUT_PANEL.

To function properly, the file must include that frame and the relevant text layers.

This plugin is intended for use within a specific workflow, but may be adapted for similar use cases.
plugins.tagline: Automatically fill a data panel in your Figma file from a remote JSON source.

137360.name: Update Human Design Panel
137360.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps in Figma.

It retrieves JSON data from an external endpoint and populates predefined fields in a frame named INPUT_PANEL.

To function properly, the file must include that frame and the relevant text layers.

This plugin is intended for use within a specific workflow, but may be adapted for similar use cases.
137360.release_notes:
PANEL UPDATER â€“ Version 1.1
Release Notes

Improved security: now uses dynamic token authentication from the Figma panel to validate all server communications.

Enhanced error handling and status reporting to external services.

Minor adjustments for stability and performance.
137360.tagline: Automatically fill a data panel in your Figma file from a remote JSON source.

plugins.name: KColor.co
plugins.description:
KColor.co â€“ The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

Create or get inspired with beautiful, accessible color palettes â€“ all inside Figma. KColor.co brings essential tools into one sleek plugin:


Palette Generator: Instantly generate harmonious color sets in multiple modes (shades, tints, gradients, monochrome or Tailwind).


Contrast Checker: Test color combinations against WCAG 3 (APCA) standards to ensure readability and accessibility.


Color Blindness Simulator: See how your designs appear to users with different types of color blindness.


Export palettes to styles, variables or other formats.


Whether you are whipping up a fresh design or polishing the final pixels, KColor.co helps you work faster, smarter, and with accessibility baked in.


Find out more about how you can get the best out of this plugin.
plugins.tagline: The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

138991.name: KColor.co

KColor.co â€“ The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

Create or get inspired with beautiful, accessible color palettes â€“ all inside Figma. KColor.co brings essential tools into one sleek plugin:


Palette Generator: Instantly generate harmonious color sets in multiple modes (shades, tints, gradients, monochrome or Tailwind).


Contrast Checker: Test color combinations against WCAG 3 (APCA) standards to ensure readability and accessibility.


Color Blindness Simulator: See how your designs appear to users with different types of color blindness.


Export palettes to styles, variables or other formats.


Whether you are whipping up a fresh design or polishing the final pixels, KColor.co helps you work faster, smarter, and with accessibility baked in.


Find out more about how you can get the best out of this plugin.

  2. æ›¿æ¢ä»…å½±å“æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹ï¼Œä¸ä¿®æ”¹å­—ä½“æ ·å¼
  3. æ›¿æ¢åŸºäºŽç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…ï¼Œè¯·ç¡®ä¿è¾“å…¥ä¸€è‡´
  4. è¯·åœ¨æå–å‰ç¡®ä¿å·²é€‰ä¸­æœ‰æ•ˆèŠ‚ç‚¹


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elementsâ€”ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click ðŸ“‹ Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.name: Frozti.io
plugins.description: Generate React components with predictable, usable code that you can customize to your exact needs. Choose your preferred UI frameworks, packages, and styling libraries to create components that fit seamlessly into your existing codebase. Unlike other generators, Frozti.io gives you full control over the output while generating useful and predictable code.
plugins.tagline: Predictable React component generator with customizable frameworks

137870.name: Frozti.io
137870.description: Generate React components with predictable, usable code that you can customize to your exact needs. Choose your preferred UI frameworks, packages, and styling libraries to create components that fit seamlessly into your existing codebase. plugins.name: Text Transfer
plugins.description: It is often necessary to copy and past text into certain elements in the design. I couldn't find a plugin that allows this to be done quickly and easily, so I decided to create one. It enables you to select multiple elements, copy the text, and paste him into other elements one by one.
plugins.tagline: The plugin allows you to quickly copy text from one element and paste it into another.

132855.name: Text Transfer
132855.description: It is often necessary to copy and past text into certain elements in the design. I couldn't find a plugin that allows this to be done quickly and easily, so I decided to create one. It enables you to select multiple elements, copy the text, and paste him into other elements one by one.
132855.tagline: The plugin allows you to quickly copy text from one element and paste it into another.

plugins.name: Sense Injector
plugins.description:
Tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swYpvTmmorg


1.Scan a component instance

2.Create a snapshot of its properties

3.Paste snapshot properties into other instances of the same component


Works well with nested components, enabling property injection deep into component structures.


All captured properties are stored as an editable JSON structure.
plugins.tagline: Copy, paste, and transfer properties between component instances

140006.name: Sense Injector
140006.description:
Tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swYpvTmmorg


1.Scan a component instance

2.Create a snapshot of its properties

3.Paste snapshot properties into other instances of the same component


Works well with nested components, enabling property injection deep into component structures.


All captured properties are stored as an editable JSON structure.
140006.release_notes: Fixed a bug that caused selected instances to be copied in an infinite loop
140006.tagline: Copy, paste, and transfer properties between component instances

plugins.name: Hoot Spotter
plugins.description: Hoot Spotter helps you catch visual inconsistencies before they fly under the radar. Choose a Control (such as your design system pattern), then select a Reference (your new design), and weâ€™ll show you what aligns and what needs fixing. From color mismatches to rogue corners, Hoot Spotter makes compliance simple, fast, and visual. Perfect for design system maintainers and teams looking to stay aligned without slowing down.
plugins.tagline: Scan components for visual consistency with your design system. ðŸ¦‰

plugins.description:
Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite.

This plugin will suit you if you use icons in your project as SVG Sprite using <use> tag.

Automatically cleans SVG from unnecessary attributes.


How to use:

You must select Component Variants with your icons.

Component variants must have the following properties:

  1. name - string
  2. stroke - Off / On


Component Variants must have no errors.
plugins.tagline: Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite

137252.release_notes: Fixed Stroke variants in file names

plugins.name: Instance Baker
plugins.description: This plugin will create raster image instances of components at 3 resolutions. It will also allow you to update existing raster image instances. Updates to components will only be reflected in previously created raster image instance by running the update feature of this plugin.
plugins.tagline: Create and update raster image instances of components.

plugins.name: TrustLens
plugins.description: TrustLens is a simple and straightforward plugin for designers to spot potential deceptive patterns before they hit production. We aim to help reduce back and forth between product, design and trust & security teams helping you deliver exceptional experiences, while building Trust by Design.
plugins.tagline: Spot deceptive design patterns before they hit production. Build "trust by design" with TrustLens..

plugins.name: Get a screenshot
plugins.description: Need to reference a website design? Or do you need to collect screenshots for competitive analysis? Use this tool to get high-resolution screen shots from websites at common viewports, without leaving Figma or FigJam.
